concept.title: Configuring Web UI users
concept.shortdesc: You can configure Web UI users to administer only by using the .

conbody.p: Web UI users can administer by using the .

When you create Web UI users, you must specify the following properties:
User ID
The name that is used by the user to log in. The name must be unique. The name can only contain the letters A - Z and a - z, the numbers 0 - 9, and the following characters: - _ . +
Role The role defines the type of Web UI user:
System administrators
Messaging administrators
Web UI users For more information about types of Web UI users, see .
Password The password for the user. The password cannot contain leading or trailing spaces. The password cannot contain the following character: "
For more information about configuring Web UI users by using the , see .
